column1: Table 1-16:  Retaila New Passenger Car Sales (Thousands of units)
a Retail new car sales include both sales to individuals and to corporate fleets. It also includes leased cars.
b Includes cars produced in Canada and Mexico.
Numbers may not add to totals due to rounding.
1970: American Automobile Manufacturers Association, Motor Vehicle Facts & Figures 1992 (Detroit, MI: 1992), p. 16.
1980-2015: WardsAuto.com, Motor Vehicle Facts & Figures (Southfield, MI: Annual Issues), pp. 17, 21, and similar pages in earlier editions..
